name: League Season Explorer (FBref EDA)
summary: Build a clean, reusable league-season dataset and run exploratory analysis for a single league/season using FBref via soccerdata, with a simple raw→processed data layout and reusable plotting utilities.

name: Player Radar & Profile Builder
summary: Generate radar/spider charts plus an auto-written scouting profile by comparing a player’s per-90 metrics to position peers across seasons, using percentile/z-score standardization and transparent filters (minutes, position, seasons).

name: Transfermarkt Scraping & Parsing Pipeline
summary: A modular web-scraping → parsing → cleaning pipeline for Transfermarkt that saves analysis-ready tables in a raw/interim/processed folder structure, designed so new tables are added via plug-in acquirers + parsers.

name: Shot Maps & xG Visualisation (Single Match)
summary: Use StatsBomb open event data to produce shot maps and basic xG visuals for a single match: pitch shot plot, goals vs non-goals, xG-based encoding, and xG-over-time timelines.
